title: New Lanston Fonts, Indie Fonts Special
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232137/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 5.Jul.2005 8.35am 

——————————  
P22 is pleased to announce the latest selection of fonts from Lanston Type  
Company. These designs compliment the existing selection and feature a few  
brand new releases.

The following titles are being offered to those on the P22 mailing list at a  
special 25% off for the month of July. To get 25% off regular prices on  
these titles Enter the code: JULY05 into the “pricing category” field in the  
online shopping cart.

——————————  
NEW TITLES AVAILABLE

LTC Caslon - a new rendering of this famous face based on the Lanston  
versions most accurately attributed to the original Caslon. This 12 font  
family includes long and short descenders, Swash Italics, small caps and a  
full range of western and central European characters. LTC Caslon also  
includes 8 open type versions  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/caslon.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232137/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/caslon.html "http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/caslon.html")

LTC Hadriano - Another familiar face but now with the first ever release of  
the original rare lower case as designed by Fredric Goudy.  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/hadriano.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232137/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/hadriano.html "http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/hadriano.html")

LTC Metropolitan - The highly regarded Centaur and ornaments designed by  
Bruce Rogers and two versions of the Arrighi Italic by Frederic Warde.  
 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/metropolitan.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232137/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/metropolitan.html "http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/metropolitan.html")

LTC WaterGarden Ornaments - A system of 11 fonts which allow for overlay  
color combinations and quick border making possibilities.  
WaterGarden Ornaments - [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/watergarden.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232137/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/watergarden.html "http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/watergarden.html")

Other new release are:  
Figures - [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/figures.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232137/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/figures.html "http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/figures.html")  
Globe Gothic - [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/globegothic.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232137/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/globegothic.html "http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/globegothic.html")  
Goudy Handtooled - [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/goudyhandtooled.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232137/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/goudyhandtooled.html "http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/goudyhandtooled.html")  
Powell - [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/powell.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232137/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/powell.html "http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/powell.html")  
Vine Leaves - [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/vineleaves.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232137/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/vineleaves.html "http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/vineleaves.html")

——————————  
INDIE FONTS

The Indie Fonts books have been republished by Rockport Publishers. They can  
now be found in almost every bookshop around North America. We still have  
some stock of the first pressing which are identical in every way to the new  
reissue...with the exception of fewer logos on the cover AND the original  
Indie Fonst 2 features handsome silver ink on almost every page (on the  
re-issue it was simply made grey). So if you would like to get copies of the  
first edition of both Indie fonts 1 & 2...now is the time.

Both Indie Fonts 1 & 2 will be $49.95 for the set of two for the month of  
July. To get this price, use the same code (JULY05) when ordering  
 [http://www.p22.com/indiefonts/indieset.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906232137/http:/www.p22.com/indiefonts/indieset.html "http://www.p22.com/indiefonts/indieset.html")
